label: claimedLanguageProficiency
comment: Skills in any principal method of human communication, consisting of words used in a structured and conventional way and conveyed by speech, writing, or gesture.

rangeIncludes.comment: Skills in any principal method of human communication, consisting of words used in a structured and conventional way and conveyed by speech, writing, or gesture.

domainIncludes.comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.
A person who is found hiding aboard a ship or other conveyance, such as in order to obtain free passage or elude detection.
